concept.title: What is multiplication
concept.shortdesc: Here you will learn what is multiplication.

conbody.p: The term "multiplication" represents a mathematical operation. Multiplication is a process, an action that you perform using numbers. Multiplication allows you to find the product of two or more numbers.
You use the multiplication (*) button to express the multiplication operation in the app.
In the multiplication process, you take a number and increase it by combining it multiple times with another number. That is, we multiply one number by another.
